channel.title: Delta fix

item.title: Delta fix
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ setAnimation(3547); specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = misc.random(72) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(655); }

OR add misc.random(playerMaxHit) + for a more realistic maxhit.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta fix
item.dc:creator: @imukaszz imukaszz
item.description:
@imukaszz wrote:

i am using deltascape how i can hit gs like 70-76s?

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){
setAnimation(3547);
specialAmount -= 50;
getHit(76);
specOn = false;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
specGFX(655);
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 3547);
npcDamage(76);
specGFX(655);
}

Read full topic
